titleStmt.title: The galants, or, The reciprocal confidents a novel / translated out of the French by a person of quality.
Dames galantes. English
titleStmt.author: Poisson, Raymond, d. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Joseph Knight and Francis Saunders ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of the author's: Les dames galantes, ou, La confidence reciproque.
Second part has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
